original_title: The Never Ending Search for Something Real
overview: Darren, a man once deprived of life, arose from the dead, stuck between life and death. He observed the world of living as a corpse, unable to interact with anything or anyone inside it. He envied the living and craved for his own life, and struggled to return to the living
tagline: Do we ever really want a death?
title: The Never Ending Search for Something Real
